lines.text: J-j-jumping Juniper! A golden egg! T-twenty-four karat solid gold! I'm rich! I'm rich! W-who's resp-p-ponsib-b-... who's responsib-b-b... who did this?
I know who it was. It was me. But I'm no fool. I know what happened to the goose that laid the golden egg.
[Makes throat-slashing sound]
W-w-well, come on now. Don't be bashful. Who did it?
I know who did it. He did it.
[Points at Daffy; the chickens lift Daffy over their shoulders, cheering]
Okay, so I laid an egg.
Say, what's going on around here? What's the big idea?
All right, duck. Make with the golden egg.
Egg, schmegg. I can't lay no egg.
[the gangsters aim their guns at Daffy]
I said lay an egg, duck.
Oh, he-he. I can't lay no egg just anywhere. I'm an artist. I've got to have atmosphere. Beautiful surroundings.
Yeah? Okay, boys. Make with the atmosphere.

[after being blown out of the pool]
It was ghastly. The deck just seemed to lift up under my feet. Then I was in the water. Black, oily water! I struggled!
[last lines]
No egg?
Gulp!... Uh-uh.
So long, pal.
[Aims his gun at Daffy's head and fires; Daffy ducks just in time, but the shock makes him lay a golden egg]
Huh? That just goes to show ya. You never know what you can do 'till... 'till you got a gun against your head. Well, Toodle-oo. See you around.
[Starts to leave, but Rocky stops him]
Just a minute, duck.
[Points to a room full of egg cartons]
Fill 'em up.
Oh, my aching back!
[Faints]
B-b-but I d-don't wanna sell him.
[Cut to the gangsters taking Daffy away, then to a beaten-up Porky]
T-t-they talked me into it.
